title: Block (BLOCK) Coin Gets Listed on BingX Spot
content: Dear Users, BingX Spot will be listing Block (BLOCK). Details are as follows: • Trading Pair(s): BLOCK/USDT • BLOCK Deposit Time: 2025-08-12, 04:00:00 (UTC+0) • BLOCK Trading Time: 2025-08-12, 08:00:00 (UTC+0) • BLOCK Withdrawal Time: 2025-08-13, 08:00:00 (UTC+0) Supported network for the aforementioned asset include: ERC20 Join BLOCK spot trading events to earn more rewards. >>Join Now<< What is BLOCK? Blockstreet is a multichain launch and growth ecosystem built to drive adoption of USD1, a cross-chain stablecoin by World Liberty Financial. As the first dedicated USD1 launchpad, Blockstreet provides smart contract deployment, USD1 liquidity infrastructure, and cross-chain support for builders across DeFi, payments, gaming, and real-world assets. Powered by LayerZero and backed by top-tier advisors and VC networks, Blockstreet helps projects launch and scale wherever USD1 is active. At the core of the ecosystem is the Block token, a LayerZero-enabled asset that provides utility, governance, and shared exposure across all projects launched on the platform. Through strategic advisory, builder grants, and deep market access, Blockstreet offers a full-stack solution for teams looking to integrate USD1 and scale globally. Whether launching a new protocol or expanding to new chains, Blockstreet connects traditional finance with Web3 innovation. Investment Risk Warning: Cryptocurrencies are highly volatile and subject to various risks, including market, project, technical and compliance-related uncertainties. Therefore, you may experience potential investment losses due to high volatility and various risks associated. Exercise caution, stay informed on the potential risks and invest prudently. BingX remains committed to providing an enhanced trading experience and services. Thank you for your continued support and understanding. Note: 1. Please make sure that the selected chain or network on BingX is consistent with the platform you're performing the withdrawal or deposit to avoid unnecessary losses. 2. The platform will automatically adjust the relevant parameter limits for spot trading based on market liquidity. If you have any questions, please contact our 24/7 online support. 3. The listing time specified in the announcement is for reference only. We will open the trading service once the deposit requirement for the above asset is met. The actual opening time shall prevail.
